reviewText: This is a fairly good DVD. It has several levels of workouts, although all are short. If you're looking for the more tricky reformer moves, they are here in the advanced section. Each section has a series that is done over a barrel, so if you don't have one (and I suspect most people w/ home equipment don't) that portion is not very useful. To be honest, I think I get a better reformer workout with the Stamina Pilates DVDs, but I like that this one offers some different moves that I can add into my regular workout.
Title: N/A

reviewText: The 'bible' of Pilates videos - for professionals only, however. A 'must have' reference work which should be consulted on a regular basis by professionals.
Title: N/A

reviewText: As an instructor trained in a more contemporary method of pilates I wanted to learn some classical technique.  The cues are wonderful but it moves VERY fast.  Be prepared to hit pause a lot.  If you are unfamiliar with pilates this is not a good starting point as it moves too quickly.
summary: Great learning tool for contemporary instructors
Title: N/A

reviewText: I am just someone trying to learn more about my Pilates Equipment - and learn more about being able to use it.  This dvd is very informative.  I haven't sat through the entire dvd yet - I am currently just doing the basic workout - but I plan to watch this (and really pay attention) when I want to do more.  This is not an exercise video - it is more of an educational video - and I knew that when I purchased it.  However, if you really want to learn how to get the most out of your equipment - you can't go wrong.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this because I own a reformer, try to work on my skills and Joseph Pilates and his lineage are generally good teachers. This was impossible to hear, had poor sound quality and the person who narrated had a (not being xenophobic, just descriptive) weird Whatever-European accent. After repeated attempts to hear what was being said, I put it on the "sell this at some time" shelf. Useless.
Title: N/A
